name: GDIntercept
description: A tool to intercept and modify GD requests.

issues.info: Inform issues through the repository issues page.

code-settings.name: Code Settings
code-settings.description: Settings related to the user interface.

theme.name: Theme
theme.description: The theme of the code block.

snapping-aggression.name: Snapping Aggression
snapping-aggression.description: The amount of update cycles between each scroll axis lock in the code block.

censor-data.name: Censor Sensitive Data
censor-data.description: Censors all known sensitive keys in GD and some common sensitive keys.

raw-data.name: Raw Data
raw-data.description: Displays data in its raw state without any manipulation of the text besides capping the amount of rendered characters.

decode-data.name: Decode Response Data
decode-data.description: Decodes and parses encoded strings in official GD responses. Formats with excesive sizes won't be parsed.

max-characters-per-line.name: Max Characters Per Line
max-characters-per-line.description: The maximum amount of characters rendered in 1 line. May be slow for larger strings.

minimize-side-menu.name: Minimize Side Menu
minimize-side-menu.description: Minimizes the side menu to only show icons.

list-settings.name: List Settings
list-settings.description: Settings related to the request list.

filter.name: Filter
filter.description: Filters out requests from specific sources.

hide-badges.name: Hide Badges
hide-badges.description: Hides the badge icons in the request list.

proxy-settings.name: Proxy Settings
proxy-settings.description: Settings related to the proxy server.

pause-between-plays.name: Pause Between Plays
pause-between-plays.description: If this is enabled, GDI will remember the pause option between session.

cache-limit.name: Cache Limit
cache-limit.description: The amount of requests to cache before removing the oldest one.

log-requests.name: Log Requests
log-requests.description: Logs all requests made in the current session to the Geode console.

log-http-messages.name: Log HTTP Messages
log-http-messages.description: Logs all requests/responses made in the current session to the Geode console once a response is received.

open_capture_menu.name: Open Capture Menu
open_capture_menu.description: Opens the menu with the captured packets.

next_packet.name: Next Packet
next_packet.description: Selects the next packet in the capture menu.

previous_packet.name: Previous Packet
previous_packet.description: Selects the previous packet in the capture menu.

side_bar_keybinds.name: Side Bar Keybinds
side_bar_keybinds.description: All the side bar keybind settings.

collapse_side_bar.name: Collapse Side Bar
collapse_side_bar.description: Toggles the side bar between collapsed and expanded.

open_save_files.name: Open Save Files
open_save_files.description: Opens the save folder of GDIntercept.

open_theme_files.name: Open Theme Files
open_theme_files.description: Opens the theme folder of GDIntercept.

save_packet.name: Save Packet
save_packet.description: Saves the selected packet to a file.

copy_code_block.name: Copy View
copy_code_block.description: Copies the contents of the current code in view.

pause_packet.name: Pause/Resume Packet
pause_packet.description: Either pauses or resumes the selected packet.

code_block_keybinds.name: Code Block Keybinds
code_block_keybinds.description: All the code block keybind settings.

raw_code_block.name: Raw/Formatted Code
raw_code_block.description: Either shows the raw or formatted code.

code_line_up.name: Line Up
code_line_up.description: Scrolls one line up in the code block.

code_line_down.name: Line Down
code_line_down.description: Scrolls one line down in the code block.

code_page_up.name: Page Up
code_page_up.description: Scrolls one page up in the code block.

code_page_down.name: Page Down
code_page_down.description: Scrolls one page down in the code block.

code_page_left.name: Page Left
code_page_left.description: Scrolls one page left in the code block.

code_page_right.name: Page Right
code_page_right.description: Scrolls one page right in the code block.
